item.title: Potholes next to Springfield park car park, 5th December
item.description:
In carpark behind Hesters Way Road houses and council block of flats. Entrance Road off Welch Rd to car park area. Numerous pot holes -13 plus sizeable potholes. Risks damage to car tires and people breaking ankles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Welch Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tripping at Springfield park in the parking area, 5th December
item.description:

item.title: Severn trent drain - tarmac coming away from edges of the drain. causing the drain to be raised. it is situated outside an over 60+ development block and residents are worried about tripping/unsafe. the drain is outside Homespring House GL52 2QB, 5th December

item.title: Traffic light sequence at Kingsditch roundabout on Tewkesbury road has changed, 5th December
item.description:
The sequence has changed and as a consequence the traffic is building up on the roundabout itself and blocking the exits for vehicles when the lights turn to green on approaching roads. A lot more delays than there have been over the last few weeks- (this has been like this for a number of weeks).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Traffic light head is facing wrong direction
